title: conda build: never exits, two ERRORED test_archives tests
body:
trying to update conda package, linux build never finished after 3h. Looking inside [log](https://dev.azure.com/conda-forge/feedstock-builds/_build/results?buildId=377738&view=logs&j=d0d954b5-f111-5dc4-4d76-03b6c9d0cf7e) on azure:

edit: ha -- this one already has `@known_failure_githubci_win` so might be reminiscent of that setup (no longer used iirc -- all windows testing on appveyor)


consistent across all python versions.  For the "stall" (never quits that "Run docker build") I have only one clue to try: #5983 . I think I will also just patch to skip those two tests on conda for now.
